synopsis.text: Tsubomi Hiiragi, Mikami Kamiki, and Yuuki Toujou take center stage in this special thirteenth episode, included in the sixth Blu-ray volume of 22/7. On the anniversary of their formation, 22/7 makes a triumphant return in front of their devoted fans. The following day, the group reunites at their agency, only to find the enigmatic Wall fully restored. To lift everyone's spirits and dispel the growing unease, Sakura suggests a festive Christmas party. However, the celebration takes an unexpected turn when three strangers, dressed in identical uniforms, introduce themselves as new members chosen by the Wall.  (Source: Funimation)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
